db_read_sql_select: SELECT 'eci' AS source,b.header_id AS file_header_id, b.bill_id AS bill_header_id,b.reported_claim_number AS reported_claim_number,b.date_bill_received_by_payer AS date_bill_received_by_payer,b.txm_invoice_number AS txm_invoice_number FROM txm_bitx_eci_staging.eci_bills b WHERE b.header_id = <INPUT_FILE_HEADER_ID>
SELECT b.bill_id AS bill_header_id FROM txm_bitx_eci_staging.eci_bills b WHERE b.header_id = <INPUT_FILE_HEADER_ID>
transform_sql_select: SELECT h.bill_id AS bill_id FROM read_patient_vw v JOIN db_bill_header_vw h ON h.bill_header_id=v.bill_header_id

db_read_sql_select: SELECT b.bill_id AS bill_header_id,b.txm_doc_type AS txm_doc_type,'BILL_ITEM_TYPE' AS file_type FROM txm_bitx_eci_staging.eci_bills b WHERE b.header_id = <INPUT_FILE_HEADER_ID>
transform_sql_select: SELECT h.bill_id AS bill_id,txm_doc_type,file_type FROM read_billing_documents_vw v JOIN db_bill_header_vw h ON h.bill_header_id=v.bill_header_id
